==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|口|t1=mouth|乎|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – to exhale, call, or shout from the mouth 口. Note that 乎 is used as an exclamation particle, hence connotations of “an exclamation from the mouth, a shout”.

Note that the right side is 乎, not [[平]] – these differ in that 乎 has a slanted top and a hook at the bottom.
